channel.title: Ableton-Live on matkv.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Ableton-Live on matkv.dev

item.title: Getting back into digital music production
item.description: After several years of not really messing around with music production, I’ve decided to finally bite the bullet and actually buy a DAW (Digital Audio Workstation). I bought the Standard version of Ableton Live and I’m really motivated to get back into this hobby and actually learn it from the ground up again.
